title: Mark Hammer PREC*
address: 3215 Macdonald St, Vancouver, BC V6L 2N2, Canada

reviews.name: A Louise M
reviews.text: Mark helped us find the perfect place and we highly recommend him. He made the purchasing process totally smooth and easy, and made what can be a stressful experience fun! We would definitely work with him again.

reviews.name: Dustin Cozicar
reviews.text: Mark was really great and easy to deal with! He always sent me listings and made sure I was being taken care of, even when I couldn't be bothered to look too hard myself. When it came time to buy a new place, Mark made the process as stress free as possible and really took care of me.

reviews.name: Shannon Campbell
reviews.text: During the sale of our condo Mark was professional and positive at all times (even when we were nervous!). He managed to get us multiple offers and the opportunity to choose the offer that best suited our needs. He offered suggestions and strategies that made our condo more desirable for buyers and facilitated closing dates that worked with the purchase of our new home.  He enabled us to move in to our forever home with as little stress as possible. I would highly recommend Mark for any of your real estate needs.

reviews.name: Asia Green
reviews.text:
If you want to sell your house at top dollar and don’t want to lose your dream home to a bidding war, call Mark Hammer.
Let him and his team of professionals work for you!
I’ve dealt with a few real estate agents in the lower mainland area and only one didn’t leave a bad taste in my mouth.
Mark, I sincerely thank you for getting us our dream home headache free for the second time  ❤️❤️

reviews.name: Andrew Au
reviews.text:
Mark is an exceptional realtor who helps you stand out in an incredibly competitive Vancouver market. I was recommended to Mark after numerous unsuccessful attempts at entering the market with other realtors. Mark did not disappoint.

As a first time home buyer, Mark helped me navigate the Vancouver real estate market and provided timely and knowledgeable advice tailored to my needs. Mark quickly identified our preferences and helped us find the property we wanted. He advised on building quality, strata and insurance considerations, and did his due diligence whenever I sought his opinion.

After finding the correct home, Mark's connections, experience, and professionalism helped us navigate and win a very competitive multiple offer situation. He closed the deal quickly and at the correct cost, beating out multiple other buyers while still providing exceptional value.

Mark goes above and beyond for his clients. I highly recommend Mark for anyone seeking a realtor in Vancouver and will definitely be using his services again in the future!

reviews.name: Iyiola Adeyemi
reviews.text: Mark was very excellent in helping us find a house. He was very helpful in working us through all the motions of a first time home buyer and he really knew the area which was quite evident in our interactions. He was quick to understand what we wanted and demonstrated this in providing listings that met our needs. He was also super helpful in providing all of the information that I asked for and would take his time to work us through them just to be sure we understood what we were looking at and what to look out for in a building/apartment/listing. I will definitely recommend Mark to anyone!

reviews.name: Julie Lepper
reviews.text: Mark is an excellent realtor, I’ve worked with him for years and each time is such a pleasure. He is so knowledge and very professional. I’ve been so happy with his work and his dedication which is why I keep going back to work with him. Thanks so much Mark! You really do make housing dreams come true.

reviews.name: Arvin Girn
reviews.text:
This past November we decided to put our house on the market and chose Mark Hammer to represent us. We are very pleased with our decision to go with him. He literally took the stress and headache out of selling our home and we found him to be extremely pleasant and basically a terrific guy to work with. He was VERY professional, helpful and accommodating with finding our new home and also managed to get us an amazing deal on the price! We are thrilled with our new place, and look forward to spending many happy years in our new neighborhood. Without a doubt we will definitely recommend Mark to any of our friends who plan on buying or selling. Thanks for a job well done.

Sincerely,

A&K

reviews.name: Bryson Norrish
reviews.text: As a first time home buyer I can only express how comfortable Mark made the entire process for myself. Every aspect of my journey was handled well, from gaining an understanding of the market, helping to determine the right place for me, through to making offers and eventually closing on a place that turned out to be a fantastic deal. There was never any pressure throughout the process and I can only be thankful for Mark in providing his professionalism and experience in guiding me through this process. Looking forward to working with Mark again in the future.

reviews.name: Jim Colbert
reviews.text: Besides being very hard-working and knowledgeable about pricing and the market, Mark has a rare quality most people don't think about looking for in a realtor, but should – namely, great contacts in the trades. He's helped me find people for all sorts of renovations, from kitchen to oil tank removal, and they've always been great. Also helped guide us through two moves. And he returns his calls. A great choice.

reviews.name: Brian Todd
reviews.text: Mark is one of the best! and has all the connections needed to get the deal done. I have bought two condos through Mark and wouldn't go through anyone else. His professionalism and expertise are unmatched.

reviews.name: Erin Cranston
reviews.text: Mark is a true professional and guided us through the process of purchasing a home with comfort and ease.  He was attentive to our wishes and needs and highly responsive and knowledgeable any time we had questions.  In the end, he secured an excellent deal for us and we are so pleased with our new home.  We look forward to working with him again in the future and would highly recommend him to anyone looking for an excellent realtor to assist them in selling or purchasing a home!

reviews.name: Aaron Van Pykstra
reviews.text: Mark has sold my property for me and did an excellent job.  I was ecstatic with the work he did as I was fully informed at all times and we sold the property for the maximum price.  I have also referred him some fiends and he has also sold and bought them properties and they were  very impressed with his professionalism and diligent work.  I highly recommend Mark to be your Real Estate Agent when selling or buying property

reviews.name: Bev Black
reviews.text: Mark gave our house excellent market exposure, resulting in multiple offers. The house sold for over the asking price to a buyer who will love and care for our house and garden. We are delighted.

reviews.name: Shawn Anderson
reviews.text: We found Mark to be head and shoulders above the other realtors we met both in terms of market knowledge and trustworthiness.  We used him to buy our first home and then again to upgrade a few years later.  On both occasions,  friends were shocked at how well we did,  due to Mark's advice (timing, marketing, etc). You can tell he genuinely enjoys his work and doing his best for you.  All around pleasure to work with and will request him again for any real estate dealings.

reviews.name: u. milovic
reviews.text:
I can highly recommend Mark - he's been a great allie over the years with my real estate needs.
He is an expert in this market, knows the trends and is on top of his game - always ready to send listings or jump in the car and check out a place. He takes the worry out of the process - especially important if you are just starting getting into the market...

reviews.name: Lala Bralic
reviews.text: I first met Mark Hammer over 20 years ago at an open house and was very impressed with his knowledge and professionalism. He has since worked with me on 4 home sales/purchases over the years. He is very patient and savvy and extremely hard working - most of all- he gets the job done. He stands out amongst other realtors. Over the years, I referred him to many co- workers and friends and they all had very positive experiences and results with Mark!

reviews.name: Jennifer Mah
reviews.text: Mark is a great realtor! He always made himself available for viewings and answered all possible questions we had. He's the reason why we ended up with our dream apartment, even though it had multiple competing offers on it, and we'd definitely use him again

reviews.name: Mike Eubank
reviews.text: Mark and his assistant Kayleigh were fantastic to work with.  We bought our dream house and Mark even lent us a dolly for the move.  Highly recommend.

reviews.name: dan jillings
reviews.text: Mark was recommended to me by a friend and I was not disappointed! Selling my place went seamlessly, in under two weeks, over asking! He was so helpful and personal. Thanks mark!

reviews.name: Michael Ireland
reviews.text:
Insightful, knowledgable and diligent!
In the years I have known and worked with Mark, he has become my go to resource for the most strategic real estate decisions.
Thank you Mark, your the best!

reviews.name: Karim Jiwa
reviews.text: Highly professional, friendly and responsive realtor. Has great knowledge about the market and provides excellent advise. Mark was able to sell the property during Covid-19 which is a feat unto itself. Wishing continued success to Mark and years of continued business with our team.

reviews.name: Len Bykowski
reviews.text: Mark is always at the top of his game. He stays current with the changing trends in the real estate market and keeps his clients informed. Mark works hard, he is highly responsive, positive and frankly earns his money.

reviews.name: Damon Green
reviews.text: I have dealt with Mark Hammer for all of my real estate needs for over 15 years. His service has always been exemplary. I highly recommend Mark to all my friends, family and clients.

reviews.name: Missy at Clover Salon
reviews.text:
When it comes to real estate Mark consistently offers knowledge, expert marketing strategy and the best all around service.  He sold my property in unprecedented times (during Covid-19) for above asking price.  He was considerate of the sensitive situations for everyone involved; myself, my tenants and prospective buyers.  Mark was able to get my listing up in a flash and used 3D virtual tours to show my property.
Mark has helped me acquire one property and has now sold two for me and in each outcome I've been more than satisfied - he is the best!
When any talk of real estate comes up I never hesitate to recommend Mark Hammer.  He's the best agent I've ever worked with and I feel sorry for people who don't have him working for them!

reviews.name: Nima Sakian
reviews.text: If you want your place sold , call this guy. Sold mine in 7 days.  Cash offer.

reviews.name: steven yan
reviews.text: I have used Mark over the years in multiple transactions for buying and selling.  When I was looking to purchase a site to build a new home, he came to my office and identified all potential sites in the location I was looking to buy.  He sent letters and door knocked for me.  This is something most realtors will not do for their client.  When selling, he was able to drum up multiple offers and negotiate to get me the highest price possible.  As an investor, he had made  multiple recommendations where I was able to profit in every situation.  So regardless of your needs, he will go the extra mile to do what is needed.

reviews.name: Cass Tuck
reviews.text:
I would 1000% recommend Mark Hammer to help you buy or sell your home.

Mark was straighforward to deal with, he answered all our questions clearly and nothing was too much to ask. He managed to not only sell our house during a pandemic, but sell it in record time and for a GREAT price, even though the entire globe was falling apart.

Mark updated us with relevant news either daily or more often as needed. He kept a clear line of communication on offers and what we could expect. He knows the city and the market very well.  He did what he said he would do.

The photos and video tour he arranged were fantasitc and the whole process was so easy. I would use Mark again and I would recommend him to my friends and family.

Thanks Mark!

reviews.name: Adam Hiscox
reviews.text: Mark was amazing. Very professional, very open and honest. When he says he can get the job done, he can. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Neil Kirk
reviews.text:
As a repeat client of Mark’s I was more than happy to work with him again. Mark effectively marketed my home getting me multiple above-asking offers, all while securing my new home at an incredible value.

Mark's ability to complete both transactions in a seamless manner was beyond appreciated, getting me the exact dates I needed for both properties, and setting me up with everything I needed.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Mark to anyone. He is incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and trustworthy.

reviews.name: brian billingsley
reviews.text: Mark is a hands on, can-do realtor who's able to navigate a real estate deal with decisive professionalism. Definitely working with him again.

reviews.name: Travis Hawton
reviews.text: Great guy! Excellent at what he does as he found us our dream home in less than 24 hours! Thanks Mark

reviews.name: Brendan Ferguson
reviews.text: Mark helped us get a good price selling our house and a great price on a new property.  He is an attentive, hard working, smart, knowledgeable and fun to be around character who has a ton of industry connections and always a smile on his face.   We very much appreciated his professionalism,  his handle on the market and most of all his patience with us while we tried to find the "perfect" property.  I look forward to more opportunities to work with him in the near future.

reviews.name: Conor Kinsella Real Estate
reviews.text: Mark was fantastic to work with. I would recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell in Vancouver East & West. he provides great value and tells it how it is!

reviews.name: Sharon M
reviews.text:
If you want a knowledgeable, trustworthy, reliable realtor Mark Hammer is the one you want to represent you when buying or selling your home.

I highly recommend him.

reviews.name: Wyatt Anderson
reviews.text: Have worked with Mark on multiple deals and would highly recommend him to anybody looking to buy or sell real estate in the Vancouver and surrounding areas.  A pleasure to work with!

reviews.name: Jim Otoole
reviews.text: I’ve dealt with Mark on numerous transactions and he’s always gotten me the house that I wanted for the right price.  It’s one less thing to worry about when you have an honest reliable realtor by your side. I can’t recommend Mark enough.

reviews.name: PJ Jhamat
reviews.text: Mark was very helpful during a very difficult time in my life a s helped me sell my home for optimum value. I would highly recommend and refer Mark to my friends and family.

reviews.name: Maureen Steltman
reviews.text:
Mark is a strategic and smart realtor who knows how to generate interest in a property when you’re selling, and when you’re buying, how to get the best price. We’ve bought and sold with Mark four times in the last two years.

Two houses were sold, both within 10 days for over asking and over city appraisal, in a down market. We bought two houses, both at well under asking price, and significantly under assessed value.

The results speak volumes about Mark’s skill as a salesman; his communication has been excellent along the whole journey and we couldn’t be happier with our outcomes!

reviews.name: Daniel Ingram
reviews.text: Mark has sold two of my homes and I can't say enough about his professionalism and experience. Highly recommended for buying or selling residential of all sizes in a broad spectrum of neighbourhoods.

reviews.name: Charles Madill
reviews.text: Always good service.  I have dealt with Mark many times    He continues to work hard for us on every occasion.

reviews.name: Zach Graham
reviews.text: I've bought a sold three property's with Mark Hammer.  Super smart and everything went quicker than expected.   On a plus side i own a motorcycle shop and he refers all his friends business to us.    Zach Graham - International Motorsports Motorcycle Company

reviews.name: Chase Romine
reviews.text: Mark is quick to answer any questions I have. He gets the job done. Thanks Mark.

reviews.name: Josh Brown
reviews.text: I've worked with Mark for at least a few decades and through four purchased and three sales. Always happy with my places and prices.

reviews.name: G Blightt
reviews.text:
Mark, did an outstanding job selling my apartment in gastown, he got slightly under asking in a challenging condo market.

I have been working with Mark for years buying and selling investment property’s and I rely on him heavily for his knowledge, professionalism, hard work and honesty.

G

reviews.name: Gavin Parr
reviews.text: I have bought and sold several properties through Mark during the past 20 years. He has always been a pleasure to work with and always commits 100% to his work.

reviews.name: Bill Wu
reviews.text: I sold and purchased with Mark Hammer as my representative over a two year period. He came highly recommended via word of mouth, and I in turn have suggested his service to others because of my positive experiences with Mark’s professionalism, knowledge and connections in a topsy-turvy real estate market.  I’m most impressed with Mark’s after sales service and the thoughtful follow ups. Thanks Mark for being a super agent.

reviews.name: Sydni Dines
reviews.text: Mark is an exceptional realtor with great attention to detail. Working with Mark and his team is always a pleasure.

reviews.name: Mike Laycraft
reviews.text: Mark is a super nice guy to deal with, he goes above and beyond to help you out

reviews.name: R Dolan Construction
reviews.text: Mark is a Great Guy.
